attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rolf has been a wonderful entertainer for many years and in so many different guises; as an artist, a presenter, singer and musician.  He is loved by all age groups.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
